name: Sealed Pavement Maintenance - Digouts all depths

name: Acceptance Criteria - Services located by Chorus and Delta prior to works commencing.
Frequency - Once for each work location
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Record M4 Test Document
Acceptance Criteria - Confirm material meets M4 Spec
Frequency - Once for each work location
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Scala on fault to determine digout depth

Frequency - One set of tests for each patch
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Digout complete to required depth. Stability of subgrade assessed
Acceptance Criteria - No soft spots, uneven areas or potential issues affecting roads foundations
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Clegg testing to be done on backfill
Acceptance Criteria - Clegg Impact Value to be greater than 25
Verifying Document - Photos, Field testing document
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Clegg testing to be done on backfill
Acceptance Criteria - Clegg Impact Value to be greater than 35
Verifying Document - Photos, Field testing document
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cement added and raked evenly
Acceptance Criteria - 1 Bag per 10 m2, raked evenly
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Litres of Emulsion used per m2
Verifying Document - Add comment of Litres used
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Clegg testing to be done
Acceptance Criteria - Clegg Impact Value to be greater than 35
